In preliminary animal study done in cats ( n = 31), Pedersen et al demonstrated promising results with remdesivir at an initial dose of 2 mg/kg/day in naturally occurring SARS-CoV-2 infection.
9 Additionally, antiviral activity of remdesivir has also been established in vitro against several other viruses, including Marburg virus, Nipah virus, Measles, Mumps, Parainfluenzae, Hendra virus, Respiratory syncytial virus etc.
